evidence.title: README (segment 1)
README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt:
tRPC

Move fast and break nothing.
End-to-end typesafe APIs made easy.

evidence.title: README (segment 3)
evidence.excerpt: tRPC allows you to easily build & consume fully typesafe APIs without schemas or code generation.

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: - ‚úÖ  Well-tested and production ready. - üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è  Full static typesafety & autocompletion on the client, for inputs, outputs, and errors. - üêé  Snappy DX - No code generation, run-time bloat, or build pipeline. - üçÉ  Light - tRPC has zero deps and a tiny client-side footprint. - üêª  Easy to add to your existing brownfield project. - üîã  Batteries included - React.js/Next.js/Express.js/Fastify adapters. _(But tRPC is not tied to React, and there are many [community adapters](https://trpc.io/docs/awesome-trpc#-extensions--community-add-ons) for other libraries)_ - ü•É  Subscriptions support. - ‚ö°Ô∏è  Request batching - requests made at the same time can be automatically combined into one - üëÄ  Quite a few examples in the [./examples](./examples)-folder

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: There are a few [examples](https://trpc.io/docs/example-apps) that you can use for playing out with tRPC or bootstrapping your new project. For example, if you want a Next.js app, you can use the full-stack Next.js example:

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: ```sh # yarn yarn create next-app --example https://github.com/trpc/trpc --example-path examples/next-prisma-starter trpc-prisma-starter

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: # npm npx create-next-app --example https://github.com/trpc/trpc --example-path examples/next-prisma-starter trpc-prisma-starter

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: # pnpm pnpm create next-app --example https://github.com/trpc/trpc --example-path examples/next-prisma-starter trpc-prisma-starter

evidence.title: bug: when `serializer` in `httpLink` can not return `FormData`, even though tRPC can serialize it when using in `input` directly
evidence.excerpt: bug: when `serializer` in `httpLink` can not return `FormData`, even though tRPC can serialize it when using in `input` directly (state:open)

evidence.title: v11.10.0
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * fix(tanstack-react-query): mark react-dom as optional peer dependency by @bbinya1224 in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7108 * docs(docs): Add Nx Plugin for AWS to Awesome tRPC Collection by @cogwirrel in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/6965 * feat(client): return origin error in cause in localLink by @evolvomind in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7134 * fix(client): client connectionParams should respect specified encoder by @SirajChokshi in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7132 * docs: Add tRPC Docs Generator to extensions list by @liorcodev in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7122 * docs: document Fastify v5+ requirement for tRPC adapter by @tarunsinghofficial in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7109 * chore(docs): improve wording in docs by @sajadtorkamani in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7133 * fix(ci): allow backticks in semantic PR by @KATT in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7141 * feat(server): add `batchIndex` to procedures and middleware in batched requests by @anatolzak in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7097 * chore(www): update companies using by @KATT in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7145 * Improve layout control in CompaniesU‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v11.9.0
evidence.excerpt: ## What's Changed * feat(client,server): add experimental_encoder option for WebSocket connections by @SirajChokshi in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7100 ## New Contributors * @saltyshiomix made their first contribution in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7115 * @SirajChokshi made their first contribution in https://github.com/trpc/trpc/pull/7100 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/trpc/trpc/compare/v11.8.1...v11.9.0
